hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: Did you know that ReDead mourn their defeated friends?

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #3# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #the Market#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #15# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #hearts#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Basement Eye Switch Room Grass 1

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Market## has #23# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.
